content.text:
Let me analyze the target structure and provide a detailed solution.

Analysis of the Main Target Image:
- The structure has 8 distinct blocks
- It has 4 layers from bottom to top
- At the bottom: Red curved blocks forming a rail-like structure with a blue cube
- Middle section: Red arched blocks as support with a yellow horizontal block
- Upper section: Two green vertical blocks with a yellow horizontal block on top
- Top: Orange triangular block

Step-by-step assembly from bottom up:
{
Step1: Move block with index 3 (leftmost red curved piece)
Step2: Move block with index 4 (middle red curved piece)
Step3: Move block with index 6 (rightmost red curved piece)
Step4: Move block with index 7 (blue cube)
Step5: Move block with index 1 (left red arch)
Step6: Move block with index 2 (right red arch)
Step7: Move block with index 10 (yellow horizontal block for middle layer)
Step8: Move block with index 8 (left green vertical block)
Step9: Move block with index 9 (right green vertical block)
Step10: Move block with index 12 (yellow horizontal block for top)
Step11: Move block with index 15 (orange triangular block)
}

Each block is chosen to exactly match the orientation shown in the target image, with no rotation needed. The assembly builds from the ground up, ensuring stability and proper placement of each component.
